title: authentication login with valid credentials
description: Test the /api/auth/login endpoint with valid email and password to ensure successful login returns accessToken, refreshToken, and professional details.

title: authentication refresh token renewal
description: Test the /api/auth/refresh endpoint to verify that providing a valid refreshToken returns a new accessToken and maintains session security.

title: authentication logout invalidates tokens
description: Test the /api/auth/logout endpoint to ensure that user tokens are invalidated and the user session is properly terminated.

title: authentication request otp code
description: Test the /api/auth/request-otp endpoint to verify that a 6-digit OTP code is generated, stored in Redis with a 5-minute TTL, and sent to the user's email.

title: authentication verify otp code
description: Test the /api/auth/verify-otp endpoint to confirm that submitting a valid email and correct 6-digit OTP code verifies the user and allows password recovery.

title: professional management create new professional
description: Test the POST /api/professionals endpoint to create a new professional with required fields including name, email, password, commissionRate, and role, ensuring proper role-based access control.

title: client management create new client
description: Test the POST /api/clients endpoint to create a new client with valid data and verify that the client is associated with the correct tenant.

title: service management create new service
description: Test the POST /api/services endpoint to create a new service with price and duration metadata, ensuring data is scoped to the tenant.

title: appointment management create new appointment with conflict validation
description: Test the POST /api/appointments endpoint to create a new appointment, validating that scheduling conflicts for the same professional and time slot are detected and prevented.

title: transaction management list transactions with filters
description: Test the GET /api/transactions endpoint with query parameters for type, category, startDate, and endDate to verify correct filtering and pagination of financial transactions.
